column5: I woke up early this morning and went down to fish before my wife woke up. I was able to catch one nice sauger. I caught it on a 3" white berkly power grub. The sauger and hybrid striper  fishing should be picking up as the weather cools down here on the ohio river.  I let the fish go. This was the only one that i caught but i guess it was better then not fishing.
Nice Fish.  Fer all of you that are wonderin' what the difference is between a Walleye, is the lack of the white spot on the tail.
Glad to see ya out and about with a rod and reel Matt  Thanks for sharing
Sauger are cool.  I wish we had more of 'em up this way.  Always love reports from the sunny south( relatively )so thanks for that Matt!
Sauger, very cool. From a river or lake...
Cool!  Great catch...something I've never seen up close and personal before.
i caught it in the ohio river. There are so many of them here in the ohio. I think the daily limit is 10 and i see so many people taking 10 fish home every time they are out.
